alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 1:23PM MST until February 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 85 mph are expected. * WHERE...The Southeast New Mexico Plains and most of West Texas. * WHEN...From 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ this morning to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may result in significant visibility reductions, particularly downwind of plowed fields, construction sites, and oilfield leases.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
